title: Update Visual Trust image URLs (positions 2, 3, 4, and 6)

requirements.summary: Update Visual Trust grid image sources for items #2, #3, #4, and #6 to use the provided external URLs while keeping layout, captions, and ImageWithFallback behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Visual Trust image #6 uses `https://i.postimg.cc/kMHyrr6n/IMG-20260214-043956.jpg` (as an external URL, consistent with the other external images).
Visual Trust image #5 remains unchanged from its current configuration.
Remove or update the existing TODO comment about the missing 6th image URL so it no longer claims the 6th URL is missing.

file_operations.description: In the `images` array, replace the `src` values for the 2nd, 3rd, and 4th items with the user-provided URLs; update the 6th item to use the provided external URL (switch from generated-asset `filename` to `src` + `isExternal: true`) while keeping the existing captions, layout structure, and `ImageWithFallback` usage intact; remove/update the TODO comment indicating the 6th URL is missing; ensure the 5th item remains unchanged.
